name: craft-todoist-sync
description: Bidirectional sync system between Craft.do and Todoist

scripts.sync:once: npm run build && node dist/index.js once
scripts.sync:continuous: npm run build && node dist/index.js continuous
scripts.sync:status: npm run build && node dist/index.js status
scripts.db:tasks: npm run build && node dist/db-admin.js tasks
scripts.db:projects: npm run build && node dist/db-admin.js projects
scripts.db:documents: npm run build && node dist/db-admin.js documents
scripts.db:deleteProject: npm run build && node dist/db-admin.js delete-project
